welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New City! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and delicious cuisine. We can't wait for you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Westchester County Apt Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Westchester County Apt Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport, where all commercial flights are operated from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights, providing a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Orange County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
